content.rendered:
h Maple is a structured event for 6thgraders and new families. Seventh and eighth graders are also welcome to sign up but may alternately choose to attend the grade 7/8 walk through on August 30th.     

  • Grade 6 – Monday, August 28th & Tuesday August 29th (during Discover Maple)  
  • Grade 7 – Wednesday August 30th (11AM to 2PM) 
  • Grade 8 – Wednesday, August 30th (11AM to 2PM) 

Additional information for Discover Maple will be sent out in early August. 

 

Discover Maple Sign_Up Link

If you have any questions, feel free to contact Mr. Singer at s_singer@saratogaschools.org.
